title: Accounting Education Design Based on Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting concepts and practical experience in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, featuring a curriculum that reconstructs accounting concepts through visual metaphors and narratives in smart device-centric limited environments

learning_goals: Students can explain accounting concepts using three or more metaphors through digital storytelling.
Students complete over 80% of story-based microlearning content produced in mobile environments.
Learners will achieve at least 70% proficiency in applying accounting concepts in formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
